mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart(cart_no, member_id, item_no, cart_quantity, cart_price, money) VALUES (seq_cart_no.NEXTVAL, #{member_id}, #{item_no}, #{cart_quantity}, #{cart_price}, #{money})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cart WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND item_no = #{item_no}

SELECT c.cart_no, c.member_id, i.item_no, m.member_name, i.item_name, c.cart_price, c.cart_quantity, c.cart_date, (item_price * cart_quantity) money FROM member m, item i, cart c WHERE m.member_id = c.member_id AND i.item_no = c.item_no AND c.member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY c.cart_no
SELECT NVL(SUM(i.item_price * c.cart_quantity), 0) cart_price FROM cart c, item i WHERE c.item_no = i.item_no AND c.member_id = #{member_id}
